type.description: The type of the item. Always `compaction`.

id.description: The unique ID of the compaction item.

encrypted_content.description: The encrypted content that was produced by compaction.

created_by.description: The identifier of the actor that created the item.

title: Compaction item
description: A compaction item generated by the [`v1/responses/compact` API](/docs/api-reference/responses/compact).
